rooms.roomPrompt: Vending machine gives one random clothing item worth between 30-60 tokens. Cost is 50 tokens. If the rat does not have 50 tokens, the machine will take the debt by draining blood equivalent of 50 health.
Rat volunteers as host for experimental parasite.
Room contains nothing except the bitter cold. If rat survives it gets 100 tokens.
Glue trap with 25 food as bait.
Unfriendly rat will tell you something about the facility. Will try to steal items if you have any.

Rat controls a random peasant, ratatouille style. Give the peasant a name and some traits. This human needs to defeat 7 knights (7x coinflip) in cagefight to death or rat and peasant are killed. If rat wins, gets item worth 100-250 tokens.
Trap room. First a trapdoor with spikes at bottom, and then a rolling ball. Ends with poison shower. If rat survives gets all balance in room.
Local healer. Heals rat for equivalent token payment, + 5% markup.
Merchant, buys defunct items for their novelty. Pays 50% of value for items if not functional on this floor, 95% if functional.
Big hungry piranha. Will eat rat if it comes near. 250 tokens in watertight container floating in middle of room.

Advanced item merchant sitting in bubble of air in room. Gives rat 500+ token value item (with 5% markup cost) for equivalent token cost if rat is liquid. Will deal 25 damage to rat if deal doesn't go through.
Fish that will tell you a story about the history of this world for 5 tokens.
Water in this room is boiling. After two minutes, very high voltage current activates in rod in water. If rat survives, gets full room balance in tokens.
Room is empty. Rat is alone with inner voices. Full room balance to rat if out of room completely unscathed.
